page.title: 11P.C. THOMKINSON
page.content:
{P.C. Thomkinson}came to see us today. P.C. means{police Constable.}If you want to be a policeman you have to be 5 foot 9\ inches. If you want to be a {police-woman}you have to be 5 foot 6\ inches. If there is a{burglary}about ten{police cars}would surround the house and hopefully catch the burglar. If you want to be a{policeman}you have to go to a training college and you have to take exams about the law. Around{Earith}there are no policemen that carry guns.I asked P.C. Thomkinson if he had ever fought a burglar with a gun. He hadn't. P.C. Thomkinsons car had no siren. I don't know why. P.C. Thomkinson let us have the light on he had a first aid kit for{accidents.}
(By Beverly Cocker aged 8 years)
